title: Pluto-centric RNA-seq schema
description: This schema describes an RNA-seq data file and requirements for computational processing in Pluto, a GDPR-compliant platform.

sample_id.description: Sample identifier must be provided and cannot contain spaces. The computational workflow makes use of this attribute; values can typically copied from `specimenID`, `sample`, etc..

r2_fastq.description: Read #2 FASTQ file, typically gzipped. If runType is pairedEnd, this is required.

strandedness.description: Strandedness must be provided and be one of 'auto', 'forward', 'reverse' or 'unstranded'; can default to 'auto'.

readPair.description: Indicates whether FASTQ file represents read 1 or read 2; relevant only for pairedEnd.
